task: Analyze the input image and return anomaly data. Focus on precise segmentation.
constraints: Output must be RAW JSON only.
Do NOT output markdown code blocks.
Do NOT provide Python code or conversational text.
Do NOT attempt to regenerate the image.

rules.detection: Identify foreign objects on the road surface (trash, debris, lost cargo).
rules.segmentation: Provide a high-fidelity polygon (list of [x, y] points) that tightly wraps the anomaly for mask generation.
